topic.title: CHANGELOG: ZeroTalk++ forum engine
topic.body:
**Work In Progress**

What is done so far:

☑ Votes start from 0.
☑ Support for images in posts and comments via `![](url..)`
☑ Support for video and audio: `![](blabla.mp4)`, `![](blabla.mp3)`.
☑ The long format of the topic list. (The content is formatted and partially visible.)
☑ Use the same colors for user names as in ZeroMe
☑ Colorize the topic's creator name
☑ (2019.06.26) Moderators can modify or delete any post from the UI.
☑ (2019.06.26) Display the actual forum title instead of pretty useless "Newest topics", and also instead of the "Main" link in the breadcrumb navigation.
☑ (2019.06.26) Fixed the old upstream bug with incorrect ordering of sticked topics. Now sticked topics should always be displayed above non-sticked ones and follow the order from the config.
☑ (2020.03.11) Don't stop working silently, when there's no `settings.topic_sticky_uris`.
☑ (2020.03.11) Implement the configurable notice `settings.new_topic_notice` instead of the hard-coded one. Also add the similar `settings.new_comment_notice`.
☑ (2020.03.11) Disable voting for your own posts/comments.
☑ (2020.03.12) Implement switching topic list view modes via `settings.topic_list_mode`:* brief, normal, long, full*.
☑ (2020.03.12) Several parts of the HTML template are now configurable: `settings.topic_new_link`, `settings.topmenu_links`, `settings.head_more_links`.
☑ (2020.03.15) New option: `settings.force_signing_all_content_with_master_key` to be used for initial data signing when migrating all the user content from another site
☑ (2020.03.18) New option: `settings.sticky_topic_list_mode` to override the view mode for sticky items in the topic list
☑ (2020.03.18) Fix incorrect (reverse) ordering of sticky items
☑ (2020.03.19) Display the topic creation time in the topic list
☑ (2020.03.19) Various small fixes in CSS
☑ (2020.03.21) Add the full version of the Roboto font (not just base latin characters)
☑ (2020.03.22) Use the local (system) version of the Roboto font, if available
☑ (2020.03.26) Fix topics not sorted in groups
☑ (2020.08.22) New option: `settings.topic_list_order_by`. Possible values: *last_activity* (default), *topic_creation*, *comments_num*, *votes_num*, *topic_author*.
☑ (2020.08.23) Various fixes in CSS.
☑ (2020.08.23) Redesign of the header menu in mobile-friendly way.
☑ (2020.08.23) Deprecation of `head_more_links`. Use `header_menu_links` instead.
☑ (2020.08.23) Add options related to rendering images and other media: `allow_images`, `detect_media_by_description`, `detect_media_by_extension`. (The same option names are used in ZeroBlog++)
☑ (2020.08.24) Import CORS-related functions from ZeroBlog++ implementing the dynamic CORS-requests for images located on other zites.
☑ (2020.08.24) Implement topic searching.
☑ (2020.08.25) Improvements in the search engine.
☑ (2020.08.25) Jump to #Comments anchor when clicking on the `N comments` link
☑ (2020.08.27) Various fixes in CSS
☑ (2020.08.27) Save and display the modification time for topics and comments.
☑ (2021.03.28) Display the user status next to the name. (Administrator, SuperModerator, Moderator)
☑ (2021.03.28) Add new topic list view mode: `tiny`.
☑ (2021.03.28) Add UI for changing list view mode and sorting order.
☑ (2021.10.27) Fixes in blockquote styles.
☑ (2021.10.27) Fixes in the dark theme.
☑ (2021.10.27) Fix https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/ZeroTalk/issues/89
☑ (2021.10.30) Added support for `site-specific/css/all.css` and `site-specific/js/all.js` according [to the proposal](http://127.0.0.1:43110/14Zjt1CcoLXs6xu3huy5sYoK4PRMC1Qdfp/?Topic:1635424219_1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4/)
☑ (2021.10.30) Added popup menu when clicking on the topic author name (previously it was implemeted only in the topic list and not by in topic page itself).
☑ (2021.10.30) Added menu item "Open ZeroMe Profile"
☑ (2021.10.30) Add support for ZeroMe user avatars
☑ (2021.10.31) Add new menu item "Send PM on ZeroMail" for user menus

Links:

topic.title: FAQ & User Manual
topic.body:
### How to add an image to your post or comment

1. Upload an image to any zite, if not yet done.
   Possible options:
   * [ZeroUp Unlimited](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/)
   * [ZeroUp@anotherneko](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1A6kYPexXbPRLfDD1DK1oiqsBmWdBwun8f/)
   * Run your own copy of ZeroBlog and upload your images there.
   * Publish an image to ZeroMe.

2. Copy the image URL.
3. Type `![](your image URL)`

For example:

```
![](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/data/users/1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4/1598243554-205200-1920x1080.jpg)
```

Here's the result:

![](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1CiXRY9ATZSoZqBzwMfXEMsKtPRt2aQoF2/data/users/1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4/1598243554-205200-1920x1080.jpg)

When you view a page that has some images located on zites you haven't yet downloaded, the forum asks for your permission to download those zites. If you haven't given permission or the images can't be found or accessed for another reason, the forums shows a placeholder in place of the images.


### How to embed a video or audio in your post

Basically it's the same as for images. Upload the file somewhere in the network and paste a link surrounded by `![](...)`.

If URL ends with `.mp4`, the forum recognizes it as a video. And if it ends with `,mp3`, the forum recognizes it as an audio. If you are using files of a different format, you should give the forum a hint:

```
![video:](link)
![audio:](link)
```

The forum doesn't support asking for permissions and automatical downloading of zites for audio and video files. This defect will be fixed in the future.

### Search Bar

Currently, the search function is limited in searching only for topics and topic groups. Searching for comments is not functional yet.

The search function displays results from all over the forum (not from specific topic group), even if you run the search from a topic group.

The following predicates can be used in the search query:

#### author:name

Searches by the author name.

Examples:

`author:geekless`

`author:geekless@zeroid.bit`

`author:1GooUE19488nDwG3TdkM8seYAHct4gjkq4`

#### date-before:YYYY-MM-DD, date-after:YYYY-MM-DD

Search by date.

Examples:

`date-before:2019-12-31`

####  comments:N, votes:N

Search for topics that have the specified number of comments or votes.

Examples:

`comments:0`

`votes:>10`

`votes:<4`

####  type:(topic|group)

`type:topic` — search for ordinary topics only
`type:group` — search for topic groups only

> [quirrel](#comment_2_13kHXBodQf1zHGQ66harDbXAQvvJh5zr3Y): Explain a bit mechanism you used for video. Is it stored permanently on user's machine?

Videos are just optional files, uploaded to ZeroUp.

> [quirrel](#comment_3_13kHXBodQf1zHGQ66harDbXAQvvJh5zr3Y): So I just download them and keep seeding?

Yep.

I'm going to add some settings, so user will have more control on that feature. It's probably better to display a placeholder with some controls, instead of inserting video instantly.
I'm also going to merge features of ZeroBlog++ (and finally make a release of it, lol) into ZeroTalk++, so there will be profile pages with ZeroMe integration and so on.

> [leftside](#comment_5_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): How'bout user's choice to show image or video contents?

The major parts of code are implemented in [ZeroBlog++](http://127.0.0.1:43110/19fZJhX7FGENeRRLB8ftgrziBJ5vsLtFog/?Home). I'm now working on merging the code base.

> [leftside](#comment_6_16dEowtNbV89NxPcDrAKkmnuXtiJVoVcDm): If it's written in Russian

The souces? Ahaha! No... It's CoffeeScript.

I'll translate the todo list..

> [styromaniac](#comment_3_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): How do I share a video? Just make a URL?

`![](url)`

If it ends with mp4, it displays as the video HTML tag, if it ends with mp3, - the audio tag. Else image.

> [styromaniac](#comment_5_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Make sure you disallow clearnet links. 

Fixed.

> [styromaniac](#comment_8_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Now for IPFS. [...]

Not sure if we should allow embedding any non-zeronet media at all. They can be used for tracking users. IPFS works on the plain IP addresses, it is almost the same dangerous as clearnet.

> [styromaniac](#comment_10_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Non-added site (Deleted ZeroUp to test on my end) [...]

It should generate CORS requests automatically in the same way as [ZeroBlog++](http://127.0.0.1:43110/19fZJhX7FGENeRRLB8ftgrziBJ5vsLtFog/?Post:3) does, but I haven't ported the code yet.

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_3_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): i thought hotlinking media from other sites does not work automatically, unless site has the feature to ask user to grant permission to load from external site

It works. You don't need the CORS permission for hotlinking.

ZeroBlog++ asks for the permission in order to check and download the site that contains the media. ZeroTalk++ just silently doesn't show images and don't asks anything, when you don't have the site on your host. (The feature not implemented yet.)

ZeroMe URLs look like:

